title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Rural and Community Development
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Rural and Community Development 

(Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2025. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 2 June 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited rural community development (alteration name department title minister) order 2025 (2) order come operation 2 june 2025

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in
text_raw:
2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in 

the Irish language, An Roinn Forbartha Tuaithe agus Pobail and, in the English 
language, the Department of Rural and Community Development, is altered, in 
the Irish language, to that of an Roinn Forbartha Tuaithe agus Pobail agus 
Gaeltachta and, in the English language, to that of the Department of Rural and 
Community Development and the Gaeltacht.
text_norm: 2 name department state present name irish language roinn forbartha tuaithe agus pobail english language department rural community development altered irish language roinn forbartha tuaithe agus pobail agus gaeltachta english language department rural community development gaeltacht

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, whose
text_raw:
3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, whose 
present title is, in the Irish language, an tAire Forbartha Tuaithe agus Pobail and, 
in the English language, the Minister for Rural and Community Development, is 
altered, in the Irish language, to that of an tAire Forbartha Tuaithe agus Pobail 
agus Gaeltachta and, in the English language, to that of the Minister for Rural 
and Community Development and the Gaeltacht.
text_norm: 3 title minister charge department state whose present title irish language taire forbartha tuaithe agus pobail english language minister rural community development altered irish language taire forbartha tuaithe agus pobail agus gaeltachta english language minister rural community development gaeltacht

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: In any enactment or any instrument made under an enactment -
text_raw:
4. 

In any enactment or any instrument made under an enactment - 

(a) 

(b) 

to 

references 
the Department of Rural and Community 
Development shall be construed as references to the Department 
of Rural and Community Development and the Gaeltacht, and 

to 

the Minister 

for Rural and Community 
references 
Development shall be construed as references to the Minister for 
Rural and Community Development and the Gaeltacht. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

6 May, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 9th May, 2025.
